dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 92 IH: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency of the Department of the Treasury relating to the review of applications under the Bank Merger Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barr (for himself, Mr. Fitzgerald, and Mr. Moore of North Carolina) submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency of the Department of the Treasury relating to the review of applications under the Bank Merger Act.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency of the Department of the Treasury relating to the review of applications under the Bank Merger Act (89 Fed. Reg. 78207 (September 25, 2024)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.
